stanzas: The steps of a good man are ordered by the Lord, and he delighteth in his way. Though he fall, though he fall, he shall not be cast down for the Lord upholdeth him with his hand.
With his hand, with his hand. For the Lord upholdeth him with his hand. Though he fall, though he fall, he shall not be cast down, for the Lord upholdeth him with his hand.
The steps of a good man are ordered by the Lord, and he delighteth in his way. Though he fall, though he fall, he shall not be cast down for the Lord upholdeth him with his hand.
With his hand, with his hand. For the Lord upholdeth him with his hand. Though he fall, though he fall, he shall not be cast down, for the Lord upholdeth him with his hand.
